revised_title: Additional Refractive Indices of Quartz, Vitreous Silica, Calcite, and Fluorite
tldr: This paper presents additional refractive indices for quartz, vitreous silica, calcite, and fluorite, expanding on previous research by the authors. The study uses a specific method of measurement and includes seven new wave-lengths, some of which are particularly valuable due to their brilliance. The research highlights the accuracy of the instruments used and the improvements made in the measurements.
